description.zh: Documize Community 是一个开源的、自托管的企业级知识管理解决方案，适用于技术与非技术用户。它支持统一管理内部和面向客户的文档内容。该平台基于 Golang 和 EmberJS 构建，可在多种操作系统上以单一可执行文件运行。
description.en: Documize Community is an open-source, self-hosted, enterprise-grade knowledge management solution designed for both technical and non-technical users. It enables unified documentation management for internal and customer-facing content. The platform is built using Golang and EmberJS, and runs as a single executable binary across multiple operating systems.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 在统一平台中整合内部与外部文档管理
- 轻量级部署，支持多平台运行的单一可执行文件
- 支持多种数据库和认证方式
- 提供免费的 Community 版本与功能增强的 Community+ 版本

## 功能列表:

- 支持通过标签、空间和分类组织内容
- 所有数据库类型均支持全文检索
- 内置多语言支持，包括英语、德语、法语、中文、巴西葡萄牙语、日语、意大利语和阿根廷西班牙语
- 支持邮箱/密码、LDAP、Active Directory、Keycloak 和 CAS 认证方式
- 兼容 Firefox、Chrome、Safari、Edge、Brave、Vivaldi 和 Opera 浏览器
- 支持 Linux、Windows、macOS 及 Raspberry Pi（ARM）
- 支持 AMD 和 ARM 64 位架构
- 提供两个工作日内响应的产品与技术支持
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Combines internal and external documentation in one platform
- Lightweight, single-binary deployment across multiple OS and architectures
- Supports a wide range of databases and authentication methods
- Offers both free Community and enhanced Community+ editions

## Features:

- Organization of content using labels, spaces, and categories
- Full-text search support across all database types
- Multi-language support including English, German, French, Chinese, Portuguese, Japanese, Italian, and Spanish
- Authentication via email/password, LDAP, Active Directory, Keycloak, and CAS
- Browser compatibility with Firefox, Chrome, Safari, Edge, Brave, Vivaldi, and Opera
- Available for Linux, Windows, macOS, and Raspberry Pi (ARM)
- Support for AMD and ARM 64-bit architectures
- Responsive product and technical support within two working days
